title: Genovese crime family
summary: The Genovese crime family (pronounced [dʒenoˈveːze, -eːse]) is one of the "Five Families" that dominate organized crime activities in New York City and New Jersey as part of the American Mafia. They have generally maintained a varying degree of influence over many of the smaller mob families outside New York, including ties with the Philadelphia, Patriarca, and Buffalo crime families.
